wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2012-08-27：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2012-08-31：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2012-09-10：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2012-09-20：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2012-09-30：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2012-10-11：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： i think it's also possible to have SQLi on 51greenorange.com 详细说明：  I was trying out http://www.51greenorange.com/Fittings.aspx?type=31' order by 99 --and i got back the following error字符串 ' order by 99 -- and pro_Audit=1 and getdate() between pro_AutoUp and pro_AutoDown order by pro_Order,pro_ID desc' 后的引号不完整。   漏洞证明：  So i probably did the %20or%201=1 same time as you and found out that the following link produces no error.http://www.51greenorange.com/Fittings.aspx?type=31%20or%201=1Thus, i strongly believe that it's possible for SQLi.   修复方案：  Fire related developers :P   版权声明：转载请注明来源 Gunther@乌云
